question: Two pipes A and B can fill a tank in 20 minutes and 30 minutes respectively. If both pipes are opened together, the time taken to fill the tank is:
explanation:
Part of the tank filled by both pipes in one minute = $latex \\frac{1}{20}+\\frac{1}{30}&s=1$
Required time = $latex \\frac{1}{\\frac{1}{20}+\\frac{1}{30}}=\\frac{20\\times 30}{50}=\\frac{60}{5}&s=2$ 
âˆ´ Required time = 12 Minutes 
Hence option [D] is the right answer.
